title: Ingmar Bergman
creator_credit: Stig Bjorkman, Stattan Hedqvist and Svenska filminstitutet
brief_description: Ingmar Bergman is widely acknowledged by film critics as adopting an intellectual stance towards film making, as well as being one of the great directors of actors. This documentary includes clips from his films and indicates his working relationships with actors. The film also brings out the requirements involved in being a film director. Suitable for upper secondary level.
